subs.text: This may have finally decided me to support Warren. I've saying this about software and communication forever. Why would you get into this field if you didn't want to do outlandishly new and interesting stuff. There were no boundaries when I was getting started in the 70s. Yet so many people saw them. "People will always do X," they would say, where X was something everyone was about to stop doing, forever.
A question. When Repubs do their gerrymandering, do they take voter suppression into account in their algorithm? Because if they do, they can be thwarted by new GOTV technology.
